description:
Listen to audiobooks in our new, more convenient mobile application. Log in to your account and try it now!

Audioteka is a free app, where you can download or listen to audiobooks directly from your device. We offer you a possibility to listen free chapters, buy, download and listen to bestsellers wherever you are. The app allows you to find thousands of audiobooks on Fiction, Non-fiction, Arts & Entertainment, Biography and Autobiography, Business, Children, Classics, Crime & Thrillers, Science - Fiction & Fantasy, Health & Personal Development, Young Adult, Podcasts & Newspapers and many more.

The Audioteka application is in short:

- the ability to create a list of favorite items

- integration with Apple CarPlay
- Google Chromecast support
- access to your shelf
- the ability to easily recommend and share content with friends
- offline listening to previously downloaded content
- snooze function (auto-turn off the audiobook)
- option to set the speed of listening to the audiobook (from 0.5 up to 2x faster)
- possibility to rate audiobooks
- the ability to listen to podcasts and broadcasts
- constant help and customer service

More features coming soon!

If your shelf is empty, because you do not have an account at Audioteka yet, listen to the free broadcasts and podcasts that we have included in the new version of the application.

Terms of service: https://web.audioteka.com/pl/l/tos
Privacy policy: https://audioteka.com/pl/privacy-policy

Welcome to a wide world of wonderful audiobooks, ebooks, and things that aren’t books but are still pretty great.

Storytel is home to beloved stories, in-depth podcasts, and exclusive Storytel Originals.

Whether you listen or read, you’ll find the right story for any moment.

• Explore a massive library of stories in English and other languages
• Jump freely from story to story until you find one you love
• Build your bookshelf and get personalized recommendations
• Find what fits your mood, like crime, feel-good, or self-development
• Follow your favorite authors and series
• Browse and share reviews and reactions
• Try out that book your friend keeps talking about
• Discover what’s trending in the culture

LISTEN AND READ YOUR WAY

• Listen to audio stories on your iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch and CarPlay
• Stream stories or download them for later
• Switch between listening and reading anywhere in a book
• Listen at your own pace: regular, sped up, or slowed down
• Set bookmarks and attach your thoughts as notes
• Drift off to dreamland with the sleep timer
• Spare those pretty eyes with Dark Mode
• See your stats and set a Listening Goal

KIDS MODE INCLUDED

• Let your kid find adventure in a space with just children’s stories
• Show or hide children’s books in your bookshelf
• Set your own pin code for parental control

HOW IT WORKS

Storytel is available in 25+ countries, including both local and international story treasures in different languages. A subscription gives you access to our ever-growing library of audiobooks, ebooks, and other stories.

In-app subscriptions will be charged via your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of the subscription period unless auto renewal is turned off in your iTunes account settings at least 24 hours before your subscription period runs out.

When a free trial is offered, we will ask you to add a payment method when starting the trial. But don't worry – if you cancel before the last day of the trial you won't be charged.

The content, languages and subscriptions available may vary by region. Some titles and offers shown above may not be available in your country or selected subscription plan.

Terms and conditions: https://www.storytel.com/documents/terms-and-conditions

Privacy policy: https://www.storytel.com/documents/privacy-policy

Questions? Feedback? Speak to a real person! Reach us at support@storytel.com

With BookBeat, you can easily enjoy more than 1 million books, right at your fingertips. We have audiobooks and e-books for all tastes that are available to you at any time on your iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch. 

Try BookBeat – Find your next book today. 

We have new releases and classics in English as well as German, Spanish, French, Italian, Swedish, Finnish and other languages. Listen to an exciting thriller or read an interesting biography and find your next book with our inspiring tips and top lists.  

You can even download books to your device, so you can enjoy a great story when you don't have mobile data or wi-fi. This works on your iPhone, iPad and even your Apple Watch. Go running with your watch and leave your phone at home or listen through CarPlay during a long car ride.  

More about BookBeat 

• No commitments, cancel whenever you’d like 

• Stream or download audiobooks to listen offline 

• Get inspired by BookBeat’s recommendations and trending lists both for audiobooks and e-books. 

• Choose how much you want to listen and read each month based on your selected package.  

• Family account with up to 5 profiles.  

• Switch to a children's profile and get content tailored for kids in the app. 

• Use the timer function before bed 

• Choose your own playback speed 

• Share your book tips with your friends 

• Place a bookmark in your audio book and add a note to easily find your favorite part again 

• Stream or listen offline even on your Apple Watch 

• Discover your listening and reading habits with our User Statistics feature and share your stats with friends. 


BookBeat supports 

• iPhone 

• iPad 

• Apple Watch 

• CarPlay 

• Dark Mode 

• VoiceOver & accessibility 

We love feedback from our customers! If you have new ideas, opinions or problems you'd like to share, reach out via e-mail at support@bookbeat.com. When you contact us, we will process your personal data, such as your name, contact details, and the content of your inquiry. The processing takes place, among other things, to be able to handle your case. Read more in our privacy policy for information about your rights.

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wattpad/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wattpad
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wattpad/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wattpad

Czytaj i słuchaj, gdziekolwiek jesteś - z Empik Go!
 Zyskaj dostęp do ponad 220 000 ebooków, audiobooków i podcastów. Czytaj i słuchaj ulubionych tytułów w jednej z najpopularniejszych aplikacji z książkami w Polsce.

Wybierz abonament Empik Go lub kupuj pojedyncze tytuły. Korzystaj z wygodnej aplikacji mobilnej i miej swoją bibliotekę zawsze przy sobie!

Słuchaj audiobooków i podcastów, gdziekolwiek jesteś
 Na siłowni, podczas biegania, sprzątania, spaceru, jazdy samochodem czy przed snem - audiobooki i podcasty będą towarzyszyć Ci wszędzie. Rozwijaj swoje umiejętności lub daj się porwać pasjonującej historii, nie tracąc ani chwili.

Tryb samochodowy
 Słuchaj bezpiecznie podczas jazdy dzięki Apple CarPlay.

Słuchanie do snu
 Ustaw wyłącznik czasowy, który automatycznie wyłączy aplikację - idealnie na dobranoc.

Dostosuj tempo słuchania
 Lektor czyta zbyt wolno lub za szybko? Wybierz idealną prędkość odtwarzania - wolniejszą, normalną lub przyspieszoną.

Słuchaj w streamingu lub offline
 Nie potrzebujesz dostępu do internetu - słuchaj offline, np. w samolocie, metrze czy pociągu.

Czytaj tak, jak lubisz - na telefonie, tablecie lub czytniku.
Aplikacja Empik Go oferuje intuicyjny czytnik e-booków dostępny na smartfony, tablety i czytniki. Możesz pobrać aplikację na swój czytnik Kindle, PocketBook, inkBOOK lub korzystać z dedykowanego czytnika GoBook, który automatycznie synchronizuje się z Twoją biblioteką.

Dowiedz się więcej: empik.com/go/kindle

Personalizuj swój sposób czytania
 Dostosuj rozmiar czcionki, styl i kolor tła. Dodawaj zakładki, notatki i zaznaczaj ważne fragmenty - wszystko po to, by uczynić czytanie jeszcze przyjemniejszym.

Stwórz własną bibliotekę i korzystaj z rekomendacji
 Otrzymuj spersonalizowane sugestie i polecenia dopasowane do Twojego gustu.

Społeczność czytelników
 Czytaj opinie innych użytkowników, dodawaj własne recenzje i polecaj ulubione tytuły znajomym - jednym kliknięciem.

Synchronizacja z empik.com
 Wszystkie ebooki i audiobooki zakupione w empik.com automatycznie pojawią się w Twojej aplikacji Empik Go.

Tryb dziecięcy / Kids Mode
 Przełącz aplikację na Tryb Dziecięcy i oddaj dziecku dostęp do bezpiecznego świata bajek i opowieści:
- Tylko treści dla dzieci, w odpowiednich kategoriach wiekowych
- Tysiące bajek, słuchowisk i ebooków
- Bohaterowie, których dzieci kochają
- Możliwość ustawienia drzemki i słuchania do poduszki
- Dziecko może tworzyć własną kolejkę odtwarzania
- Ty ustawiasz PIN kontroli rodzicielskiej i masz pełną kontrolę

Dowiedz się więcej: empik.com/go/kidsmode

Kategorie, które pokochasz:
- Kryminał i sensacja - odkrywaj mroczne tajemnice, intrygi i śledztwa, które trzymają w napięciu do ostatniej strony.
- Fantastyka i sci-fi - przenieś się do innych światów, w których wszystko jest możliwe.
- Dla dzieci i młodzieży - bajki, opowieści edukacyjne i literatura młodzieżowa.
- Biografie i reportaże - historie znanych ludzi i spojrzenie na świat oczami reporterów.
- Literatura faktu i obyczajowa - opowieści inspirowane życiem, które poruszają i skłaniają do refleksji.
- Lektury szkolne i języki obce - pomoc naukowa, klasyka literatury i wsparcie w nauce języków.

Pobierz aplikację i zyskaj dostęp do jednej z najszerszych ofert na rynku
 Nowości, bestsellery, produkcje oryginalne, tytuły na wyłączność oraz atrakcyjne promocje - tylko w Empik Go!

Zaloguj się danymi z empik.com lub zarejestruj się w kilka sekund.
 Korzystaj z wbudowanego czytnika ebooków i odtwarzacza audiobooków.
 Ciesz się swobodą czytania i słuchania - gdziekolwiek jesteś!

Ucieknij z nami od codzienności. Zasłuchaj się w dobrze przeczytanych historiach.
 Empik Go - wszystko, czego potrzebujesz, by czytać i słuchać bez ograniczeń.

Download the Legimi app for free and get unlimited access to thousands of ebooks, audiobooks, and synchrobooks® with a subscription. 
Read and listen to the products during a free trial period. If you like it, you can use up to four devices (smartphone, tablet, computer, and e-reader) to read bestsellers, hot new arrivals, and anything else you choose. When you purchase a subscription for unlimited ebook and audiobook access, you will have your books available in both text and audio versions. With synchrobooks®, you can switch formats at any time, so you will never get distracted from your reading. Legimi is a unique, mobile library available at your fingertips. 
The Legimi virtual library is full of crime fiction, fantasy, non-fiction, novels, romance, children's and young adult books, as well as guidebooks, language learning books, and textbooks for professionals. 

Reach for ebooks, audiobooks, and synchrobooks® using the convenient Legimi app: 
* You can check how much you actually read and listened to using advanced statistics. 
* Sync your bookshelf across devices such as a smartphone, tablet, computer, and e-reader (the app will remember the last page read or listened to). 
* Manage your library more easily by creating and editing collections. 
* Choose the typeface and size of the font. 
* Read in day mode (you can choose between white and sepia background) or night mode (in low light). 
* Change the orientation from portrait to landscape at any time. 
* Get constant access to thousands of ebooks and audiobooks from the Legimi bookstore, also available offline. 
* When you subscribe, you can earn Bookworm Club points and redeem them for discounts on future Legimi purchases. 

You can purchase an auto-renewable subscription for the "ebooks + audiobooks unlimited" service directly via the app. It will be renewed automatically for the same price if you do not cancel it at least 24 hours before your current subscription ends. You can manage and cancel your subscription in your iTunes account settings. 

The terms and privacy policy are available at: www.legimi.com/terms/.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a Kindle with the free Kindle app, and carry all your eBooks with you, wherever you go.

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.
 
What you’ll get:
• Sample any eBook for free
• Magazines, newspapers, graphic novels and textbooks with high-res colour images
• A customisable reading experience with your choice of font style, size and more
• Comfortable reading day and night with adjustable screen brightness and page colour
• Discover and download Kindle Unlimited eBooks and magazines
• Unique features like X-Ray, Whispersync, Page Flip, Print Replica, flashcards and more
• Instant translations and definitions, without leaving the page
• Ability to make and share in-page highlights
• Bold font and text size options
• Access to local library eBooks

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.co.uk/conditionsofuse). Please see our Privacy Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/privacynotice), our Cookies Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/cookies) and our Interest-Based Ads Notice (www.amazon.co.uk/interestbasedads).

Discover stories that matter to you, from readers like you. Goodreads is the world's largest community of readers.

Find new and interesting books by browsing personalized recommendations based on books you've read and your favorite genres. See what your friends are reading, write book reviews, and keep track of what you want to read. Goodreads is a free service for book tracking, recommendations and reviews.

Use our barcode scanner the next time you are in a bookstore. Add the book in your hands to your "Want To Read" shelf and browse reviews before buying.

Features:

• Get personalized recommendations and discover new books based on your tastes.
• Goodreads Choice Awards: vote for your favorite books of the year and see the winners!
• Participate in the Reading Challenge!
• Book cover and barcode scanner!
• Keep a want-to-read list.
• See book reviews and updates from your friends.
• Discover new books and explore popular book lists.
• Rate and review books you read.
• Share notes and progress updates as you read.
• Recommend books to friends.
• Join online book clubs and connect with other readers.

By using this app, you agree to Goodreads’s Terms of Use (https://www.goodreads.com/about/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://www.goodreads.com/about/privacy).

NovelTime - Your Pocket Library for Reading Novels & Books! 

Transform every spare moment into a reading adventure with romance novels, love stories and fiction books at your fingertips. Perfect for coffee breaks, commutes, or any time you want to read novels online.

Romance & Fiction Book Collection
Discover romance novels, love stories, mystery books and short fiction from around the world. Read ebooks in various genres including romantic novels, adventure stories and more.

Multi-Language Reading
Break language barriers and read books from global authors. Novels and stories available in multiple languages.

Extensive Library
Many romance books and fiction novels available. Find your next favorite story to read online.

Comfortable Book Reader Experience
Carefully designed ebook reader for immersive novel reading. Adjust settings for your perfect reading comfort.

Whether you're a romance novel enthusiast or just discovering the joy of reading books online, NovelTime transforms your moments into enriching reading experiences. Perfect for busy professionals, students, or anyone who loves reading stories and novels.

Romance novels, fiction books, stories to read. NovelTime, your pocket novel reader and ebook library.

Download now and begin reading novels online - where every moment becomes a gateway to amazing romance stories, fiction books and unforgettable characters!

Privacy Policy: https://www.noveltime.com/privacy-policy.html
User Agreement: https://www.noveltime.com/terms-of-service.html

NovelaGo -An essential application for lovers of online English novels!

Book genres: romance, mystery, fantasy, western, science fiction, fanfiction  
A collection of the best books and most popular releases in each genre! 
No need to buy physical books, you can read anytime, anywhere, download now and experience reading happily.

NovelaGo brings together popular novels and online books to bring you the latest chapters with the highest quality. It is the ideal application for those who enjoy digital novels.

- The first reading platform for lovers of English novels 
- Great variety of genres to choose from freely 
- Hundreds of novels online with more than 1,000,000 readings 
- A team of professional authors creates the best stories 

**Wide variety of genres** 
NovelaGo offers a wide selection of genres, from urban books to the supernatural, and is highly appreciated by a large community of readers. 
Discover many genres waiting to be explored in the NovelaGo app. 
Anyone can find their favorite online novel on NovelaGo. Start reading novels online now!

With tens of thousands of books and more than a million readings, NovelaGo allows you to enjoy as many novels as you want without having to buy the printed version.

**Team of Featured Authors** 
Our authors at NovelaGo come from different parts of the world, bringing experience and talent in various types of stories. His works are updated frequently so that fans can enjoy them again and again. 
NovelaGo continues to recruit high-quality authors and constantly brings you new recommended content.

**About payment** 
NovelaGo is not a completely free platform. We must ensure that our authors earn a stable income to produce quality content for your enjoyment. 
However, NovelaGo includes several in-app tasks that you can easily complete to earn coins and continue reading new chapters."


Subscription Information
If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account when you confirm the purchase. Unless you disable automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period, the system will automatically extend the validity period. Within the 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, the system will charge the renewal fee to the account according to the price of the selected plan. After completing the purchase, users can manage their subscriptions and automatic renewal in their account settings.

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS
* Read or Listen? Whatever your mood and the situation calls for.
* Enjoy stories anywhere, any time.

BOOK CLUB
* Join the discussion online with our vibrant Book Club community
* Join our Facebook group: https://bit.ly/3j9af5g
* Follow us on Instagram: @galatea.stories

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING
* Turn on the Dark Mode for cozy night reading

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS
* Support Galatea writers by purchasing chapters.
* For unlimited access to all of our stories, we have subscription packages!

LANGUAGES
* English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese… more on the way.

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)
By using Galatea, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines (https://getgalatea.com/terms/) and to our Privacy Policy (https://getgalatea.com/privacy)

And you, where do you read most often? In a long line, in the bathtub, on the way to work, in the woods, or maybe on a soft couch? We know very well that reading accompanies us in different places! Thanks to the Woblink app, you can always have your favorite books with you. And not just one or two, but a whole library!

Use the app in the way that suits you best:
 - Enjoy reading immediately after purchase - all titles are available on your personal shelf.
 - Customize the e-book reader to your preferences: change the brightness settings, font type and size, margins and background color.
 - Organize your library and track your reading progress.
 - Transfer your e-books to your e-reader with one click.
 
Read and listen to what you like:
 - Choose from more than 80,000 e-books and audiobooks and explore different genres.
 - Use our recommendations and tips.
 - Rate and review the books you read - share your opinion with the community.
 - Add books to your favorites.
 - We love to read and realize that reading can accompany us everywhere. That's why since 2010 we have been providing books to hundreds of thousands of readers in Poland and abroad in every available format - e-book (EPUB, MOBI, PDF), audiobook, as well as traditional book. Our customers can buy books and read them on many devices, such as readers, smartphones, tablets, laptops. Read where you want and how you want

Aplikacja SkupSzop umożliwia sprzedaż i zakup książek online.


• Sprzedawaj książki. Daj książkom drugi dom, zamiast odkładać je na półkę.
	• Pełna przejrzystość – zaakceptuj proponowaną cenę lub bezpłatnie odzyskaj książki.
	• Bezproblemowa i bezpieczna sprzedaż – brak kosztów wysyłki, potrzeby kontaktu z kupującymi, dodawania zdjęć czy opisów.
	• Skaner kodów kreskowych – sprzedawaj jeszcze szybciej i wygodniej.
	• Szybka wypłata – pieniądze trafią na Twoje konto w ciągu 24 godzin od przyjęcia paczki.
	• Pomagaj – środki za sprzedane książki możesz przekazać na cele charytatywne.
	• Wygoda – cały proces sprzedaży wykonasz w aplikacji.


• Kupuj książki nowe i używane
	• wybieraj jeden z czterech stanów zużycia: nowa, jak nowa, dobry, widoczne śladu używania
	• wybieraj dogodne miejsce dostawy
	• łącz nieopłacone zamówienia
	• płać bezpiecznie online: blik, portfele, przelewy internetowe

Flashbook creates summaries of self-help books. These books cover topics like mindset, entrepreneurship, personal finance, investing, communication, positivity, health, and more. Our summaries are designed so you can read or listen to them in just 20 minutes. After reading or listening to our summaries, you can be sure you've covered all the important information!

An in-app subscription is required to access the full application.

Terms of Use: https://flashbook.app/terms-and-conditions
Privacy Policy: https://flashbook.app/privacy-policy

Enjoy storytelling that speaks to you with Audible. Discover a collection of audiobooks, podcasts and exclusive Originals for endless listening. Stay up to date on discounted membership plans and enjoy audio entertainment of all genres today with Audible.

Focus on health and wellness by diving into self help podcasts, fitness or meditation audiobooks. Follow the latest episode of a true crime podcast or binge a bestselling audiobook series. Explore an exciting library with thousands of titles including Harry Potter, The Midnight Seller, A Promised Land and Sherlock Holmes.

Relax to calming sounds or fall into a deep slumber with sleep stories. Stream audiobooks with CarPlay on your morning commute or listen to bestsellers on your Apple Watch while on a run — tackle your to-read list with Audible. Enjoy mental health podcasts or and listen seamlessly across different devices, with or without WiFi.

Find intriguing stories that speak to you and build your library with audiobooks to keep forever. Tap into the best of audio entertainment, today.

Start listening now!

AUDIBLE FEATURES

AUDIO ENTERTAINMENT FOR EVERYONE
Listen to thousands of audiobooks and podcasts. Build a library with a wide range of genres, like:
• Science fiction
• Crime and thriller
• Mindfulness and meditation
• Sleep stories
• Kids’ books
• Biographies
• Health and wellness
• Personal development
• Nonfiction, and more

UNPLUG & FEAST YOUR EARS
Listen to storytelling that enriches you with immersive audio experiences for every moment.
• Mindful meditation, relaxing sounds or sleep stories - relax with audio fit for every mood
• Let audiobooks and podcasts captivate you throughout your day
• Enjoy true crime stories during your commute or sci-fi books on a lazy Sunday

STORIES ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Queue up downloads, adjust your listening speed and experience seamless listening with Audible.
• Offline listening - stream or download directly to enjoy Audible with or without WiFi
• CarPlay allows you to easily connect your phone to your car for continued listening
• WhisperSync - seamlessly switch between reading on your Kindle and listening on Audible
• Sleep Timer - set a timer to automatically pause your audiobook

KIDS PROFILE

Hundreds of enchanting stories brimming with surprises, entertainment, and wisdom, elevated by a captivating audio adventure for kids. When you read aloud, the app responds to your voice with delightful sounds and music. For a child, this is a wondrous audio journey, free from any screen time.

REASONS WHY YOU’LL LOVE READMIO
— We help build a positive attitude towards reading
— We create stories with the intention of supporting the mental and emotional development of children
— Our stories are short and easy to integrate with other activities
— Reading with sounds works offline and with your privacy in mind
— We add new stories every week
— It’s fun not only for your children but for you as well

LISTEN TO AUDIOBOOKS
— Stories and fairy tales also include audiobooks. This is handy when you can’t read or while driving.
— Your presence while listening to audiobooks has a positive effect. If you also maintain physical contact (holding hands, stroking the head), it’s even better.

CREATE YOUR OWN AUDIOBOOKS
— Each fairy tale or story you read aloud can be recorded and automatically transformed into your very own audiobook! With just one click.
— You can listen to the audiobooks while travelling in the car or children can listen to your voice when you are away.
— Audiobooks you create can be shared with your family or friends.

COLOURING AND MORE
— Stories include colouring pages you can print and let your children color them. It’s a great activity children can do while you read to them or the next day.
— You can also print any story and read it without the phone.

BY PARENTS FOR PARENTS
Readmio is an app full of fairy tales that we have enriched with sounds. Just download the app, save a story to the library and start reading! While you read out loud, the app follows along and adds sounds at exactly the right moment. You don’t have to worry about anything, just read at a regular speed and our application will listen to you and enhance your experience. That’s it. For best results, don’t read too fast and avoid noisy environments (e.g. in the car).

A SMALL THEATRE AT HOME
Feel free to put even more into the storytelling, our sounds and music will help you. For example, try making different voices or facial expressions and make a small home theater for your children. Your acting performance is very important for the whole experience. Some parents even prefer to use a Bluetooth speaker to make the sounds and music create a colorful atmosphere throughout the whole room.

WHY THERE AREN’T ANY ILLUSTRATIONS IN THE STORIES?
The fairy tales have beautiful cover illustrations that will help you and your children choose what you are going to read. However, the children's contact with the mobile phone should end there. In the stories themselves, we did not include illustrations intentionally because we do not want to support their time spent in front of the screen. It is better to draw children's attention to you, the sounds, and the story itself.

MEANINGFUL STORIES
We created Readmio because we believe in the power of stories. They form the basis of society and help to spread and maintain wisdom. For children, they are an ideal tool not only for expanding vocabulary but also for explaining complicated topics. We recommend that you use our stories as a conversation starter for topics you care about. You will find inspiration on how to get started in the descriptions of the individual stories.

ABOUT PRIVACY
An internet connection is required to download the fairy tale, but not for the reading itself. Speech recognition works completely offline on your device. No data or voice recordings are stored or transferred anywhere. Your privacy comes first. In addition, you can read on the go or abroad without worrying about expensive roaming charges.

We believe that you and your little ones will enjoy the application and have many magical experiences together.

ReadEra - a book reader, allows you to read books for free, text to voice and listen to books for free, offline, in the PDF, EPUB, DOC, DOCX, RTF, MOBI, AZW3, CBZ, CBR, DJVU, FB2, TXT, ODT and CHM formats.

No ads
Read books and listen to books without ads. The ReadEra app for reading books and viewing PDF documents neither contains ads nor imposes internal purchases.

No registration
We’ve made a fast, reliable reader that doesn't compel users to use any specific services. The book reader works offline and is entirely free. Read books for free and listen to books for free (TTS), without limits!

Text to Speech (TTS) 
Read text aloud with voice (TTS) – allows you to read text aloud and listen to all your books, PDF files and documents for free. With the Text to Speech (TTS) function, all your books and documents turn into audiobooks at the tap of the "Read aloud" button. TTS turns your book library into a personal audio library, making reading more flexible and enjoyable. This is especially useful for those who prefer the audio format or want to listen to books in situations where reading is impossible.
You can read foreign books and at the same time listen to the pronunciation of words and sentences. You can choose a voice, adjust the speech speed, turn on repeating text to voice of the selected text, word or sentence. 
Listen to books and documents with ReadEra while doing your things – on the go, working out, before bed and even when sleeping.

Read books of all formats
ReadEra is a set of reading apps in one app, which reads well multiple types of formats: book Epub, Kindle (MOBI, AZW3), Fb2; business PDF, Djvu; office Microsoft Word (DOC, DOCX, RTF), ODT; text TXT and others. Reading books, viewing Microsoft Word documents and PDF files from zip archives.
The reader for books, ReadEra, reads all popular formats of books, journals, articles and other documents in one app.

Best book manager for your library
Auto-detection of books and documents. Grouping books into lists: To Read, Have Read, Favorites. Sorting by name, file format, the last time read, etc. Quickly search for books, PDF files and documents in your library.

Navigation through a book
Quick access to reading settings, table of contents, your bookmarks, quotes, notes and other eBook options. Navigate through the book using the page index or the progress bar line.

Convenient reading settings
Auto-saving the current reading page. Comfortable color themes when reading books: day, night, sepia, console. Horizontal or vertical page flipping mode. Brightness and page margins adjustment, including PDF and DjVu. Separate settings for text and graphic formats. Adjustable type font, size, boldness, line spacing and hyphenation for Microsoft Word, Epub, Kindle (Mobi, Azw3), Fb2, TXT and ODT. Zoom in option for reading PDF and Djvu files.

Quotes and Notes
Create quotes and add notes to text. Highlight text in books, PDF files and documents, add personal notes to the highlighted text. A well-thought-out and simple algorithm for working with quotes and notes. All your quotes and notes in a book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the “About Document” section.

Bookmarks
Add bookmarks to save your favorite spots in books with a single tap. Just tap the upper-right corner while reading to quickly add a bookmark. All bookmarks for the book are conveniently gathered in one place—in the "About Document" section.

Text Translation
ReadEra supports integration with the iOS system “Translate” app for seamless text translation. Instantly translate text in books, PDFs, and documents using the built-in translator on your device.

Read books and Listen to books easily and for free with ReadEra!

description:
Cała Twoja biblioteka zawsze pod ręką – czytaj ebooki i słuchaj audiobooków gdzie chcesz i kiedy chcesz.

Kupione publikacje pobieraj na telefon, korzystaj offline, ustawiaj tryb nocny i ciesz się intuicyjnym czytnikiem oraz wygodnym odtwarzaczem audiobooków. Idealna dla zapracowanych, podróżujących i wszystkich, którzy kochają książki.

Publio to bezpłatna aplikacja do czytania ebooków i eprasy oraz słuchania audiobooków. Dzięki niej zsynchronizujesz swoją bibliotekę tak, by mieć wszystkie ulubione publikacje w zasięgu ręki.

Aplikacja Publio to:
- ponad 70 000 ebooków, audiobooków i wydań eprasy
- tryb nocny
- bezpłatne fragmenty do czytania i słuchania
- darmowe ebooki i audiobooki po polsku

- czytanie książek w wersji przygotowanej przez wydawcę, z zachowaniem charakterystycznego układu tekstu i graficznych wyróżnień
- intuicyjna nawigacja po treści książki dzięki interaktywnemu spisowi treści
- możliwość dostosowania wyglądu tekstu do naszych indywidualnych potrzeb: zmiana rozmiaru i kroju czcionki, wielkości marginesów i interlinii

Discover the joy of reading with Magibook - the app that changes books to match your reading level. Perfect for beginners, English learners, parents, children, and anyone who wants to enjoy books more easily.

What Magibook Offers:

•Makes Books Easier: Every book comes in four reading levels.
•Lots of Books: Read many different books, from philosophy to literary classics.
•Helps You Learn English: Great for ESL, EFL, IELTS, and TOEFL
•Good for Kids: Many valuable books can now readable by children.
•Special features for dyslexia, ADHD, and other reading challenges
•Easy-to-Use Dictionary: Learn new words as you read.
•See Your Progress: Watch how your reading gets better over time. 

For English Learners: 
Improve your English through reading. Start easy and progress to harder books. Boost vocabulary, grammar, and comprehension with famous books in simpler language. Great for IELTS and TOEFL preparation.

For Parents: 
Help your children love reading with age-appropriate books that grow with them. Improve literacy and develop a lifelong passion for literature.

For Everyone: 
We make difficult books simpler, so everyone can enjoy great literature regardless of reading challenges. Perfect for those with dyslexia or ADHD.

Why Choose Magibook?

•Personalized reading experience
•Encourages lifelong reading habits
•Improves English skills for ESL/EFL learners
•Supports special education needs
•Makes classic literature accessible
•Aids in exam preparation
•Provides graded readers for improvement
•Offers abridged versions of complex texts
•Enhances vocabulary and grammar
•Improves reading comprehension and speed 

Available Books: Magibook offers a wide range of famous books at different reading levels, including:

"Don Quixote" by Miguel de Cervantes, "War and Peace" by Leo Tolstoy, "Pride and Prejudice" by Jane Austen, "Les Miserables" by Victor Hugo, "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald, "Crime and Punishment" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "Moby Dick" by Herman Melville, "The Republic" by Plato, "Wealth of Nations" by Adam Smith, "The Ethics of Aristotle" by Aristotle, "Jane Eyre" by Charlotte Brontë, "Ulysses" by James Joyce, "Great Expectations" by Charles Dickens, "The Brothers Karamazov" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin" by Benjamin Franklin, "On Liberty" by John Stuart Mill, "The Count of Monte Cristo" by Alexandre Dumas, "Meditations" by Marcus Aurelius, "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" by Arthur Conan Doyle, "Kim" by Rudyard Kipling.

From philosophy to adventures, from romances to mysteries, Magibook brings you the best books in a way you can enjoy.

With Magibook, you can:

•Read classic novels at your level
•Improve English vocabulary and grammar
•Prepare for language tests
•Help children develop reading skills
•Make reading easier with dyslexia or ADHD
•Explore philosophy and complex ideas
•Enjoy literature in simplified English
•Track reading progress
•Use an integrated dictionary
•Find books matching your reading level 

Suitable for all language levels: A1 (Beginner), A2 (Elementary), B1, B2(intermediate), C1 (advanced), or C2 (proficiency).

Don't let difficult books hold you back. With Magibook, you can read anything. From beginner level to advanced literature, from children's stories to philosophical works. It's like having a reading tutor, dictionary, and vast library in one app.

Our mission is to increase accessibility to knowledge, understanding, and shared wisdom.
